academic.heading: Academic Excellence
academic.text: Dynamic instruction at Signal School fosters intellectual curiosity, autonomy, and self-assurance. We inspire girls and boys to cultivate distinctiveness in character and innovative thought. This has made our Pupils icons of community transformation.

headteacher_message: At Signal School, our guiding principle is 'Aim High, Be Kind, and Dare to save mother earth'. This is deeply rooted at our core and combined with exceptional teaching
footer_tagline: Mentoring a coexisting generation with creativity, innovation, and environmental respect.
ethos_text_continued: Child Art, Child Waste Management, Child Kitchen Gardening, and Child Sports are key in our teaching-learning process.
join_heading: Join us and play your part.
ethos_text_conclusion: Signal Preparatory School offers an environment where pupils are daily inspired both by the lessons in the classroom and the serenity outside.

programs.title: Child Art
programs.description: Art is a unique style of bringing an imagination to reality. At Signal Preparatory School, we equip pupils with child art skills to spark their creativity and team working abilities.

programs.title: Child Waste Management
programs.description: With the adopted slogan, "Waste is Waste if Wasted", at Signal School, we equip learners with the art of managing waste. We emphasize the 5R's of waste management to our pupils. We aim to empower ambassadors who will make Mother Earth a better place to live in.

Children learn much more through play. The more they play is the more they learn. And the more they learn is the more they play. This improves their problem solving skills, collaboration and creativity.
programs.title: Child Sports
Music, Dance and drama
programs.description: Music is the language of the soul. At Signal School, Music Dance and Drama drives the mood of learning. It improves the confidence and communication skills, creativity, team working, positive competition among others.

ethos_text: At Signal Preparatory School, our ethos goes beyond academia. We believe in nurturing the whole child, promoting co-existence, creativity, and global awareness.

about_text:
<!--StartFragment-->

Signal Preparatory is a school aiming at mentoring a coexisting generation with high levels of creativity, Innovations, world awareness and respect for Environmental Conservation in Children and young Adults.

Fostering creative thinking, problem-solving, and interdependence skills in children and young adults is a core responsibility that everyone needs to play in making the world a better place for all.
